title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2015 - Toulouse, France
description:
Global Day of CodeRetreat in Toulouse, France. 
The event will be hosted by Etincelle coworking & sponsorized by @occitech. 
It will be facilitated by Antoine Vernois and Ludovic Pradel. 
Details and registration : http://www.meetup.com/fr/Software-Craftsmanship-Toulouse/events/226586933/
